chapter.text: There were a fair amount of questions about the things I have done before,^500 and have yet to do. ^1500After all this time,^500 it’s wonderful to be respected for my creations. ^1500However,^500 if I were to tell you what was going to happen,^500 that would ruin the surprise wouldn’t it? ^1500Isn’t that what you really want? ^1500Something that gets you on the edge of your seat,^500 the big reveal,^500 and then the resolution are all something you desire,^500 no?
